about_the_game:
The wait has been LONG enough - a Demo is here for LongStory 2! By definition a Demo is a demonstration of a product that is a work in progress, which means it’s not final and it’s subject to change. But never fear, the cuteness factor will remain untouched. In fact, maybe we’ll turn it up a notch ;)

Summer vacation is winding down and everyone’s excited for the first year of high school, but when Turkeyhawk abandons the mascot suit in your closet, it’s time to find your formerly-feathered friend and make sure they’re okay. But how do you find somebody when you don’t know their identity outside the suit?



Never fear! Your friends are here to help. But when the investigation interferes with your love life, you’ll have to choose between solving the mystery and saving your relationship.

LongStory2 is a continuation of the charming and LGBTQ+ friendly dating simulator where you can be and date who you want. In this episodic visual novel, you pick your pronouns and choose your presentation, then strap in for a wacky ride as you juggle romance, friendship and life. From Rollerskating to LARPing, LongStory 2 has it all.

Don’t want to date anyone? Fair enough. You can still make friends and have fun collecting clues on your quest to solve a puzzling mystery.

Think before you act; your choices will shape the story. Just like life!

Features:

  • Get to know 6 dateable characters.
  • Pick your pronouns and choose from 2 playable characters.
  • Make friends and go on dates.
  • Gather clues and solve a big mystery.
  • Choose your own story and have fun handling whatever life throws at you.
  • Featuring a new theme song by Maggie McLean!
  • Extra CUTE date scenes with a new dateable character *no spoilers (cough it’s Hanna)
  • This is the long awaited sequel to our award-winning game LongStory. But don’t fret, you don’t need to play it in order to enjoy this game. (you’d be missing out though, just saying)

Episode synopses:


Hang on to your Weasel Heights branded baseball caps, coming soon.

short_description: Award-winning dating sim LongStory gets a sequel! The Weasel Heights gang continues to surprise and delight as you learn more about yourself, friendship and love. Play as the gender of your choice and date the friend you like best. Throw a big mystery in the mix and you’re in for an adventure!
